Calculate quantified impact at a domain level

calculate_domain_impact.Rd

Given a dataframe of simulation results summarized at the domain level, create a summarization of the annual loss expected (ALE) with descriptors at the minimum, mean, maximum, standard deviation, and 95 levels.

calculate_domain_impact(domain_summary, domains)

Arguments

domain_summary

Domain-level summary of simulation results as returned by summarize_domains.
domains

Dataframe of all domains in scope.

Value

Dataframe.

Examples

data(domain_summary)
data(domains)
calculate_domain_impact(domain_summary, domains)
#> # A tibble: 14 x 7
